problems.title: Motor Pulsing (On/Off)
solution_steps: If you have a HEPA model, wash the back filter too.

problems.title: Amber Light / Red Light
problems.description: Amber light means temp issue, Red means fault.
solution_steps: If light is solid red, battery is dead.
Replace with a V7 specific battery (V8 won't fit).

faqs.question: Is it worth fixing the issue on a V7 Motorhead / Allergy?
faqs.answer: Yes. A replacement part typically costs significantly less than a new $580 vacuum, and extending the life of your Dyson is eco-friendly.

faqs.question: How do I know if my V7 Motorhead / Allergy needs a new part?
faqs.answer: Common signs include reduced performance and the device failing to complete a cleaning cycle.

faqs.question: Can I replace the part on my V7 Motorhead / Allergy myself?
faqs.answer: Yes, this is a user-serviceable repair. Most replacements generally require just a screwdriver and about 10-20 minutes of time.
